ygData.subject: Re: Words but lack of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have found that certain creatures are more likely to drop certain types of research components. Crocs in Oasis seem to have many pages (enchanters).
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 May 1999, Robert Ricardo wrote:

> Ok I am a Mage and my friend is a Wizard. We hunt alot lf places and I
> notice that I get alot of words but he gets very few Runes. ANy idea on
> where you get a majority of Runes ? Also looking for any one that is
> excellent in Kobold (Elder Tier'Dial) on Cazic-Thule

I have found that certain creatures are more likely to
drop certain types of research components.

Crocs in Oasis seem to have many pages (enchanters).
Gargoyles seem to have many runes (wizards).
I have yet to find any creatures that drop many
words (magicians and necromancers).

Wings@Karana
